task.name: asdmsummary
task.shortdescription: Summarized description of an ASDM dataset.
task.description: Given an ASDM directory, this task will print, to the CASA log, information about the content of the dataset contained in that directory (down to the level of a subscan).
task.example:
The asdmsummary task prints to the CASA log a description of the content of an SDM dataset.
Example:
asdmsummary(asdm='10C-119_sb3070258_1.55628.42186299768')
Prints information about the requested ASDM dataset to the CASA logger.
Keyword argument:
asdm -- Name of input ASDM directory. example: asdm='10C-119_sb3070258_1.55628.42186299768'
